title: Defence Minister, MNAs Iqbal Afridi, Afzal Khan call on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 13 (APP): Minister for Defence Pervez Khattak and Members of the National Assembly (MNAs) Muhammad Iqbal Afridi and Muhammad Afzal Khan called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Thursday.
Minister for Planning Asad Umar and Special Assistant to PM Malik Amir Dogar were also present in the meeting during which political matters and the ongoing development projects were discussed.
The Prime Minister directed for further organizing and operationalizing Pakistan Tehrik-e-Insaf (PTI) in the respective constituencies.
